DOC.brief_summary: In study evaluate whether addition formal low extremity resistance exercise training program and/or nutritional supplement improve functional recovery older adult veteran participate geriatric rehabilitation program deconditioning . Specifically , subject admit geriatric inpatient rehabilitation program diagnosis deconditioning randomly assign one four group ; 1 ) Control/standard rehabilitation program , 2 ) Standard rehabilitation plus resistance exercise twice per week , 3 ) Standard rehabilitation plus daily nutritional supplement , 4 ) Standard rehabilitation plus resistance exercise nutritional supplement . Subjects participate program 12 week . At begin end study measure low extremity strength , walk speed , overall function ( use standardize Functional Independence Measure ) , compare change group .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Nutritional Intervention Deconditioned Older Adults
